description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 1st level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.QcSAKvfYjWgRetTH]{Armor of Summer's Glory}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.TznhcCIOGHRqyik7]{Vortex of Fire}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.WBCrGq1dSK2QmUy9]{Whispers of the Void}
